room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: This was the first escape room my friends and I ever attended which propelled us into the whole scene. This is by far the best room we've done and the special things they've added to this room have separated them from the competition. If you get a chance to check them out are their new location make sure you do!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Wow! This is unlike anything I've ever experienced. Super interactive and fun. If you stay calm and think things through, you'll have a good chance of getting out. That is way easier said than done though. I'm excited to see what the future holds for The Great Room Escape.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Such a unique experience! Gets your adrenaline pumping, that's for sure! I can't wait to see what they do next! Makes for a fun night out with a group of friends. The actors/staff were so helpful yet so clever at the same time.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Literally just finished the cabin excellent experience highly recommend trying it out. So much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: This was an awesome experience. I was super nervous going in. But it was a blast!! I can't wait to go back and do other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: This is the best! They have to hurry and make more so we can do this every month! I'm getting excited just thinking about it, but I don't know how to tell anyone how awesome this experience is without giving spoilers... just go, bring your friends and family, you will not be disappointed.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: I took my 22 year old son and 16 year old daughter and we all had such a great time. It's hard to find something unique and fun to do as a family and we will definitely be coming back and trying another room.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Room" by Great Room Escape in Denver
review: Amazing! It was pretty difficult mainly because our group wasn't very organized. I would recommend this to everyone!
